amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to encourage investment among joint ventures between small and large businesses as a part of the U.S/sub-Saharan African Trade and Economic Cooperation Forum.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in part II of House Rept. 105-431 to require the president to encourage investment among joint ventures between small and large businesses as a part of the U.S/sub-Saharan African Free Trade Area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
